actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to require the United States Postal Service to provide and sell a postage stamp issue to commemorate the 350th anniversary of the founding of New Haven, Connecticut.

summary.text: Directs the United States Postal Service to issue a postage stamp in 1988 to commemorate the 350th anniversary of the founding of the city of New Haven, Connecticut.

titles.title: A joint resolution to require the United States Postal Service to provide and sell a postage stamp issue to commemorate the 350th anniversary of the founding of New Haven, Connecticut.
